org.uilib.util.prefs
Class PrefStore

java.lang.Object
  org.uilib.util.prefs.PrefStore

public final class PrefStore
extends Object

A simple preferences store. All retrieval methods require a default to be specified, which will be returned when the key isn't found or type-conversion from String fails.
